lines.text: It's worse than "Showgirls"!

[during an editing session]
No, no, no! You've sodomised it!
"Certainly he is. This is LA. EVERYONE'S an Actor."
I like working with directors. And I've saved a lot of their jobs. And they've saved a few of my performances...
I don't die. Even if I die, I come back with Reincarnation, so I don't die!
The three dudes were more subliminal than the Batman Logo. We could have out-grossed ET!
We've always seen America as a very homogeneous society.
Use that name everyone be using!
I can't! I *am* Alan Smithee!

[whispers]
Call me "Daddy"!
Look, I'm doing this for free so don't bust my balls, okay?
Comedy is my life, that's why I'm star-ving!

[Post credits]
The great thing about this movie, Arthur, is that it sticks up for directors. It really does.
The last thing that the Directors of America need, Joe, is for you to be sticking up for them!
[They both laugh]
Don't fuck with me!
Don't fuck with me!
Don't fuck with me!
Don't fuck with us!

[beating his head]
I cut the picture. They cut the picture. I didn't cut the picture. They cut the picture...
I got my script back and didn't recognize a single word of it.
We tried sex, it didn't help. He did some coke, it didn't help. He ate some pasta, it didn't help.
Alan was turning into the biggest person I'd ever been with. I'm not a starfucker.
Yo! Adrian! You know we never... and we had a kid so it was an immaculate ejection.
I saw myself on the telly! I was in a bar off Sunset, drinking a pink gin, and I saw myself on the bloody telly!
[singing]
And the itsy bitsy spider climbed up the spout again...
Shane Black. Writer and Insomniac.
